item.description: There's been requests to put together travel plans for the summer. Currently, we're looking at Italy as a destination and locations (cities/villages) that are off the "beaten path." Timeframe will be the first two weeks of August. If you've been thinking about a trip, this may be a good way to get there. After we've got folks interested in this initial meeting, I'll send out a location that will be convenient to all.

group.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun

item.name: Italy, August Vacation in Siena
